BlackStorm:

"BlackStorm to Hev and Maxima"said the femme"SideWays and I are 
going to receive the new comers, see you in this coordinates" after 
sent the corrdinates
the femme looked to SideWays and said "Let's goo, Side Ways, they're 
waitting us..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> The 4 Decepticon researchers waited
> and waited
> and waited for their supposed rescuers to arrive and save their 
scratched 
> and mangled armor from the scorching sun of the African plains.
> 
> But Sand Storm was growing restless, " Why the Pit haven't they 
come 
> already? My paint jobs baking in this heat!" he complained as he 
squatted 
> down in Blue Flame's shadow to try and get out of the sun.
> 
> Although Diesel Runner squinted out into the distance, her hands 
on her 
> hips. " Maybe they're not coming."
> 
> Sand Storm looked up at her with a flabbergasted expression from 
watching a 
> lady bug crawl over his foot. " You can't be serious. They HAVE 
to!" he 
> whimpered.
> But Blue Flame only shrugged as he looked down at the little dune 
buggy. 
> Kind of feeling sorry for the little guy.
> He didn't want to be stranded here any more then Sand Storm did. 
But there 
> was nothing they could do about it. They were stuck here.
> Although...by the way Dark Cloud acted all calm and collected, it 
didn't 
> seem to make any difference to HIM.
> Blue Flame sighed as he let his shoulder-plates sag as the heat 
even began 
> to bother him too.
> They were getting low on energy again...but at that thought he 
glanced over 
> at their fearless leader.
> D.R. seemed to be going as strong as ever, even though she hadn't 
energized 
> with the rest of them before they'd dealt with that core.
> How did she do it?
> 
> "Well, if they're not here in fifteen minuets, who ever they 
are...we're 
> going to go and see if we can find a place to spend the night." 
the fembot 
> announced before turning to her crew. " I'm not going to wait 
forever for 
> anyone."
> And frankly, this heat was getting to her too.
>
